string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: A huge single or triple burger with all the fixings, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions and special sauce or mayonnaise!
A flat, open-faced baked pie of Italian origin, consisting of a thin layer of bread dough topped with spiced tomato sauce and cheese, often garnished with anchovies, sausage slices, mushrooms, etc.

A visually captivating culinary masterpiece that combines crisp greens, vibrant vegetables, proteins, crunchy croutons, and velvety dressing to create a harmonious and unforgettable gastronomic experience.

A cherished Indonesian soup, features a fragrant broth infused with lemongrass and spices, tender chicken or beef, delicate noodles, and a medley of garnishes, offering a flavorful journey through Indonesian culinary traditions in a bowl.

A quintessential Indonesian street food, boasts a flavorful broth infused with aromatic spices, tender meatballs, springy noodles, and a medley of condiments, creating a symphony of taste and tradition in a single bowl.
A global culinary staple, are a versatile canvas for culinary creativity, offering a comforting and satisfying foundation for a myriad of flavors and textures.
A refreshing elixir of natures bounty, captures the essence of ripe fruits and vibrant vegetables, offering a vibrant burst of flavor and a healthy dose of nourishment in every sip.

A beloved Indonesian delight, showcases succulent skewered meats, marinated to perfection and grilled over open flames, while bathed in a fragrant peanut sauce, creating a tantalizing fusion of smoky, sweet, and savory flavors that transport your taste buds to exotic destinations
